thought: Since the site is active, I should extract text and hyperlinks from the page to check for any scam characteristics.
observation: ­  Bway.net | NYC High Speed Internet Service Provider CALL US 212.982.9800 Webmail Home Services Fiber Internet Voice over IP Business Internet Residential/Small Office Internet Networking Services Email Services Support About Us Contact Us New York City’s Best Internet Service Provider Since 1995. Not only are we a high speed internet service provider, we solve networking and technology challenges for every device connected to the internet. Get A Quote Now! Our Services Business internet via Ethernet, Fiber, or Fixed Wireless installed quickly - speeds from 10Mb/s to 10 Gb/s. Point to point and multipoint solutions are also available. VoIP Voice over IP has never sounded so clear.  Our hosted PBX services deliver value and features beyond consumer voice services.  From 2 seats to 200, we're ready to bring your phone system up to date. Office Network Setup Hands-on white-glove service at its best. We consult, install structured cabling, networking gear, and carrier-grade WiFi Access Points. Contact us for a survey and quote. Home Internet Bway Home Internet provides low latency, non-shared connections allowing you to stream Internet TV and audio and participate in online gaming without any hiccups or overage charges. What makes Bway.net BEST 20 Years Experience We have been providing ISP services before there was a Verizon or Time Warner Cable, circa 1995. We know the New York Metro market and infrastructure. 24/7/365 Network Monitoring The Bway network is monitored 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.  We provide proactive support and our technical alert system keeps us ahead of any problems. 99.999% Uptime Uptime and reliability implemented via redundant carriers, servers and networking equipment. Local Human Support At Bway, real humans pick up the phone - no menus, no arguing with different tiers of support, no overseas call centers.  We're happy to discuss what we can do to solve your problem or improve your network. What our clients say about us "Bway offers amazing reliable and fast service. Internet you can rely on. Ali H. "Bway is simply everything good left in this world. A human touch to the service with actual interaction with people you can get to know. " "Bway is worth every penny. "It's refreshing to have an ISP that understands the specific needs of your company and cares to make sure you always have the best connection provided." Heather S. “Bway provides fast, dependable Internet. The savvy, friendly staff are always available and quick to provide support whenever needed." "I've been a customer of Bway for about 4 years now.  I've always had great customer service and there is an actual in office employee who answers the phone every time I call. Support local business and give these guys a shot.  Their prices are competitive and the service is more consistent than the big guys." Brian S. “This is the best internet provider I've had so far in NYC.  I had a variety of Time Warner cable modem connections in different parts of town for years and suffered through all sorts of problems, including unreliable connections, slow speeds, unknowledgeable techs (both on-site and on the phone) and all other sorts of nonsense." Will M. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Thousands previous next Is Bway internet available in your area? Business Name Email Phone Number Address Questions/Comments Quick Links About Bway Recent Comments Archives Categories No categories Meta Log in Entries feed Comments feed WordPress.org Customer Support VoIP (Phone Service) System Status contact us PO Box 1688 tech@bway.net Telephone: © 2024 - Bway.net. All rights reserved.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered, has a history dating back to 1995, and has a registration expiration date of 2025. The contact information is redacted for privacy, which is a common practice and doesn't necessarily indicate a scam. The domain status indicates that it is not available for transfer, which is a standard security measure. There's nothing suspicious here, but I should still check if there have been any complaints or negative reviews about this domain.

thought: The search results show customer reviews from various sources, including Yelp and Better Business Bureau (BBB), indicating that Bway.net is a legitimate business with a history of customer interactions. The presence of reviews, some of which date back over two decades, suggests that the company has been providing services for a significant period of time. There is no immediate indication of scam-like behavior based on the content of these reviews. At this point, I have not encountered any of the scam characteristics outlined in the task. The site appears to be a legitimate Internet Service Provider with a history of customer service and no red flags from the extracted text, WHOIS data, or online reviews. I now know the final answer. Based on the information gathered from the website's content, WHOIS data, and online reviews, bway.net does not appear to be a scam website.
